nodes.text: The Beast Warrior Commandos were a faction of the Beast Riders, warriors from the wilderness of the planet Onderon. During the Beast Wars, they were tasked by Modon Kira with the abduction of Princess Galia in the Iziz Royal Palace. The Commandos also fought under the banner of Modon's son Oron Kira against Galia's mother, Queen Amanoa in the Battle of Iziz. Two years later, the Beast Warrior Commandos again fought under Oron Kira, this time against Galia's father Ommin in what was known as the Freedon Nadd Uprising. Two years after that, the Commandos would see action again against the armies of Mandalore the Indomitable, in one of the final battles of the Great Sith War.
